textAfterTable: 3. Re: No more fast forward Jun 21, 2012, 08:36 kanniballl   Ratty wrote on Jun 20, 2012, 20:20: I knew this was coming. Comcast has disabled fast forwarding on some of their VOD network shows for a couple of months now. Fios started doing that years ago... especially with ABC shows. In their case, there is (or at least WAS) a work-around. Start fast forwarding IMMEDIATELY... as soon as the menu VOD menu disappears and the screen turns black. It prevent(ed) the feature from being locked out. I guess they apply the "fast-forward lock" a couple of seconds into the recording... probably just before the big screen comes up saying "we're turning off fast forward."
